mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TBL_ANN.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_ANN (ANN_NUM, ANN_NAME, ANN_FIELD, ANN_START_DATE, ANN_END_DATE, DETAIL, MNG_ID, ANN_ACT, DEADLINE) VALUES (#{annNum}, #{annName}, #{annField}, #{annStartDate}, #{annEndDate}, #{detail}, #{mngId}, #{annAct}, #{deadline})
mapper.select: SELECT ANN_NUM, ANN_NAME, ANN_FIELD, ANN_START_DATE, ANN_END_DATE, DETAIL, MNG_ID, ANN_ACT, DEADLINE, ANN_REG_DATE FROM TBL_ANN WHERE ANN_NUM = #{annNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ANN SET ANN_NAME = #{annName}, ANN_FIELD = #{annField}, ANN_START_DATE = #{annStartDate}, ANN_END_DATE = #{annEndDate}, DETAIL = #{detail}, ANN_ACT = #{annAct}, DEADLINE = #{deadline} WHERE ANN_NUM = #{annNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ANN.ANN_NUM, ANN.ANN_NAME, ANN.ANN_FIELD, ANN.ANN_START_DATE, ANN.ANN_END_DATE, ANN.DETAIL, ANN.MNG_ID, ANN.ANN_ACT, ANN.DEADLINE, ANN.ANN_REG_DATE FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_MNG MNG WHERE ANN.MNG_ID = MNG.MNG_ID AND MNG.MNG_ID = #{keyword}
ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_MNG MNG WHERE ANN.MNG_ID = MNG.MNG_ID AND MNG.MNG_ID=#{keyword}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ANN_IMAGE (ANN_IMAGE_NUM, ANN_IMAGE_NAME, ANN_NUM) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_ANN_IMAGE.NEXTVAL, #{annImageName}, #{annNum})
mapper.select:
SELECT ANN_IMAGE_NUM, SUBSTR(ANN_IMAGE_NAME, 50) AS ANN_IMAGE_NAME, ANN_IMAGE_NAME AS FILE_LOCATION, ANN_NUM
FROM TBL_ANN_IMAGE WHERE ANN_NUM = #{annNUm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ANN_FILE (ANN_FILE_NUM, ANN_FILE_NAME, ANN_NUM) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_ANN_FILE.NEXTVAL, #{annFileName}, #{annNum})
mapper.select:
SELECT ANN_FILE_NUM, SUBSTR(ANN_FILE_NAME, 50) AS ANN_FILE_NAME, ANN_FILE_NAME AS FILE_LOCATION, ANN_NUM
FROM TBL_ANN_FILE WHERE ANN_NUM = #{annNUm}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ANN_NUM, ANN_NAME, ANN_FIELD, ANN_START_DATE, ANN_END_DATE, DETAIL, MNG_ID, ANN_ACT, DEADLINE, ANN_REG_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ANN.ANN_NUM, ANN.ANN_NAME, ANN.ANN_FIELD, ANN.ANN_START_DATE, ANN.ANN_END_DATE, ANN.DETAIL, ANN.MNG_ID, ANN.ANN_ACT, ANN.DEADLINE, ANN.ANN_REG_DATE FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_MNG MNG WHERE ANN.MNG_ID = MNG.MNG_ID AND MNG.MNG_ID = #{keyword} AND ANN.ANN_ACT = 1 AND ANN.ANN_START_DATE < SYSDATE AND ANN.DEADLINE = 0
ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC)) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd})ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_MNG MNG WHERE ANN.ANN_ACT = 1 AND ANN.ANN_START_DATE < SYSDATE AND ANN.DEADLINE = 0 AND ANN.MNG_ID = MNG.MNG_ID AND MNG.MNG_ID = #{keyword}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ANN_NUM, ANN_NAME, ANN_FIELD, ANN_START_DATE, ANN_END_DATE, DETAIL, MNG_ID, ANN_ACT, DEADLINE, ANN_REG_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ANN.ANN_NUM, ANN.ANN_NAME, ANN.ANN_FIELD, ANN.ANN_START_DATE, ANN.ANN_END_DATE, ANN.DETAIL, ANN.MNG_ID, ANN.ANN_ACT, ANN.DEADLINE, ANN.ANN_REG_DATE FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_MNG MNG WHERE ANN.MNG_ID = MNG.MNG_ID AND MNG.MNG_ID = #{keyword} AND ANN.ANN_ACT = 1 AND ANN.ANN_END_DATE < SYSDATE AND ANN.DEADLINE = 1
ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC)) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd})ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_MNG MNG WHERE ANN.ANN_ACT = 1 AND ANN.ANN_END_DATE < SYSDATE AND ANN.DEADLINE = 1 AND ANN.MNG_ID = MNG.MNG_ID AND MNG.MNG_ID = #{keyword}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ANN_NUM, ANN_NAME, ANN_FIELD, ANN_START_DATE, ANN_END_DATE, DETAIL, MNG_ID, ANN_ACT, DEADLINE, ANN_REG_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ANN_NUM, ANN_NAME, ANN_FIELD, ANN_START_DATE, ANN_END_DATE, DETAIL, MNG_ID, ANN_ACT, DEADLINE, ANN_REG_DATE FROM TBL_ANN WHERE (ANN_ACT = 1 AND ANN_END_DATE < SYSDATE AND DEADLINE = 1) or (ANN_ACT = 1 AND ANN_END_DATE > SYSDATE AND DEADLINE = 0)
ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC)) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ANN WHERE (ANN_ACT = 1 AND ANN_END_DATE < SYSDATE AND DEADLINE = 1) or (ANN_ACT = 1 AND ANN_END_DATE < SYSDATE AND DEADLINE = 0)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, APP.APP_NUM,APP.ANN_NUM,APP.USER_ID, APP.APP_REG_DATE ,ANN.ANN_NAME, ANN.ANN_START_DATE, ANN.ANN_END_DATE FROM TBL_ANN ANN, TBL_APP APP WHERE ANN.ANN_NUM = APP.ANN_NUM AND APP.ANN_NUM = (SELECT ANN_NUM FROM TBL_APP WHERE USER_ID=#{keyword}) AND ANN.DEADLINE != 0 ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC)
WHERE (RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 1) ORDER BY APP_NUM DESC, APP_REG_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ANN WHERE (ANN_ACT = 1 AND DEADLINE = 1)
